items.title:
Breakfast &
Brunch
items.description:
_All Packages Include_

5 Hour Event Time, Two Hour Access Window Prior to Event Start, Customized Room Setup, Choice of White, Black or Ivory Linens for all Tables, Selection of Napkin Color(s), All China, Glassware & Flatware, Complimentary Parking for all Guests, and Uniformed, Professional Staff_._

items.title: Served Breakfast
items.description: Breakfast beverage service includes orange juice, regular and decaf coffee, and iced water. _30 guest minimum; $150 Fee applies if minimum is not met._
annotation: **Substitute Turkey Bacon or Sausage for additional $1.50 per person.
**Substitute Egg Whites for additional $1.50 per person

items.title: Cinnamon French Toast
items.description: Two Slices Texas Toast, Scrambled Eggs & Bacon or Sausage, Maple Syrup, & Powdered Sugar

items.title: The All American
items.description: Scrambled Eggs with Cheese, Choice of Bacon, Sausage or Ham, Hash Browns, & Fresh Fruit

items.title: Traditional Benedict
items.description: Two English Muffins Topped with Canadian Bacon, Poached Eggs, & Chipotle Hollandaise Sauce (vegetarian option available upon request)

items.title: Fried Chicken & Waffles
items.description: Buttermilk Brined, Oven Fried Chicken on top a Belgian Waffle & Chipotle Syrup

items.title: Breakfast Croissant
items.description: Open-faced Croissant with Scrambled Eggs, Cheddar Cheese, & Canadian Bacon. Served with Fresh Fruit

items.title: Mexican Scramble
items.description: Scrambled Eggs with Pico de Gallo & Chorizo, Tortillas and Choice of Bacon or Sausage

items.title: Buffet Breakfast
items.description: Breakfast beverage service includes orange juice, regular and decaf coffee, and iced water. _30 guest minimum; $150 Fee applies if minimum is not met._

items.title: Continental Breakfast
items.description: Assorted Breakfast Breads, Mini Muffins & Mini Danish

items.title: Deluxe Continental
items.description: Assorted Breakfast Breads, Mini Muffins & Fresh Fruit

items.title: Healthy Continental
items.description: Fresh Fruit, Individual Yogurts, Granola & Assorted Breakfast Breads

items.title: *Build Your Own* Breakfast Buffet
items.description: Breakfast beverage service includes orange juice, regular and decaf coffee, and iced water. _30 guest minimum; $150 Fee applies if minimum is not met._

list.text: Skillet Potatoes - Ortega Chiles, Cumin & Onions, Sweet Potato Hash *(Add $0.75 per person)*
Morning Star Veggie Patties *(Add $1.50 per person)*

items.title: Brunch Buffet
items.description: Brunch beverage service includes orange juice, regular and decaf coffee, and iced water. 50 guest minimum; $150 Fee applies if minimum is not met. Have our Brunch Buffet for Dinner for an additional **$5.00 _per person_**.

items.title: The Standard
items.description: Fresh Fruit, Assorted Breakfast Breads, Country Potatoes, Oven Fried Chicken w/ Gravy, Bacon, Sausage, Scrambled Eggs w/ Chives & Cheese, Build Your Own Salad Bar & one [Culinary Enhancement below](#culinary-breakfast-enhancements) (food only).

items.title: Culinary Breakfast Enhancements
items.description: $150 per attendant. One attendant per 50 guests recommended

items.title: Waffle Bar
items.description: Berries, Banana, Bacon Bits, Chocolate Chips, Whipped Cream, Syrup, Butter, & Powdered Sugar

items.title: Omelet Bar
items.description: Cheddar, Feta, Mushroom, Spinach, Diced Tomato, Peppers, Onions, Scallions, Ham, Bacon, & Sausage

list.text: Herb Roasted Prime Rib with Horseradish Cream & Au Jus
Turkey Airline Breast with Cranberry Relish & Sage Gravy
Smoked Pitt Ham with Honey Clove Orange Glaze & Ground Mustard

items.title: Juice Bar
items.description: Carrots, Apples, Celery, Cucumber, Kale, Spinach, Beets, & Pineapple

items.title: Mimosa Station
items.description: Champagne & Assorted Fruit Juices
